sentences.en: " All right, dear,'she said, giving him an affectionate peck on the cheek.
sentences.cn: “ 好吧, 亲爱的, ” 她说, 亲昵地在克拉伦斯面颊上吻了一下,“我来做饭.

sentences.en: A bird had pecked a hole in the sack.
sentences.cn: 一只鸟把袋子啄了个洞。

sentences.en: Are you going to peck with him?
sentences.cn: 你是否准备同他们一起吃饭.

sentences.en: birds pecking at breadcrumbs on the pavement
sentences.cn: 在人行道上啄食面包屑的鸟儿

sentences.en: He gave me a little peck on the cheek.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆轻吻了一下我的脸。

sentences.en: It was winter and the sparrows were pecking at whatever they could find.
sentences.cn: 已是冬天了，麻雀们能找到什么就啄食什么。

sentences.en: It would even peck my bobbing nib with its waxy red bill.
sentences.cn: 索性用那涂了蜡似的、角质的小红嘴,“嗒嗒”啄着我颤动的笔尖.

sentences.en: She caused a peck of trouble.
She gave a peck on his cheek.
sentences.cn: 她在他面颊上轻轻地一吻.

sentences.en: The chickens will peck up all the grain that you throw on the ground.
sentences.cn: 小鸡会把你扔在地上的谷子全鹐起来吃掉.

sentences.en: The cock gave me a peck.
The parrot gave me a sharp peck on the finger.
sentences.cn: 鹦鹉把我的手指?得很疼.

sentences.en: These birds peck off all the red flowers.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟啄掉了所有红色的花。

sentences.en: They turn on their own kind and peck each other to death.
sentences.cn: 它们开始攻击同类，拼命地互相啄着。

sentences.en: This bird, sharp of eye and deft of beak, can accurately peck the flying insects in the air.
sentences.cn: 这只鸟眼疾嘴快, 能准确地把空中的飞虫啄住.

sentences.en: When she tried to touch the eggs, the bird gave her a peck.
sentences.cn: 当她试图碰碰蛋的时候, 那只鸟啄了她一下.

sentences.en: Where is the peck of pickled pepper Peter Piper picked?
sentences.cn: 彼特? 帕博捡的一些有盐渍的胡椒在哪?

words.tran_cn: 啄木鸟；鹤嘴锄；穿孔器；精神；阴茎
许多；配克（容量单位，等于2加仑）；啄痕

phrases.tran_cn: n. 格里高利·派克（美国男影星）

trans.tran_cn: 啄，啄痕，（啄出的）小洞，轻吻
trans.tran_en: an action in which a bird pecks someone or something with its beak
(of birds) to move the beak forward quickly and hit or bite sth

trans.tran_cn: 啄，小口地吃，不断地批评，吹毛求疵
啄，啄食，啄出，啄穿，〈非〉轻吻，以迅速敷衍的方式亲吻

trans.tran_en: if a bird pecks something or pecks at something, it makes quick repeated movements with its beak to try to eat part of it, make a hole in it etc
